item.description: Neil Angst signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Health Insurance Solutions NW.

item.title: 👍💵Emily Brice - Northwest Health Law Advocates
item.description: Emily Brice signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Northwest Health Law Advocates. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎Chris Bandoli - NABIP WA
item.description: Chris Bandoli signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent NABIP WA.

item.description: Jennifer Ziegler signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Health Care Plans. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Jim Freeburg signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Patient Coalition of Washington.
